virality_potential.justification: Announcement about a major company adopting blockchain technology with concrete metrics (3.3M wallets) has high shareability in tech/crypto communities.

informative_value.justification: Provides specific details about Flipkart's Web3 infrastructure implementation with verifiable technical specifications.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral tone focused on factual reporting without emotional language.

duration_of_impact.justification: Enterprise blockchain adoption news will remain relevant for weeks in tech circles.

virality_potential.justification: Japanese-language crypto project list could spread within niche communities but lacks broader appeal mechanisms.

informative_value.justification: List format with project/chain pairings provides minimal context or verification.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral presentation of information without clear emotional valence.

duration_of_impact.justification: Project lists typically have short relevance cycles in fast-moving crypto markets.

virality_potential.justification: Controversial comparison between blockchain platforms could drive engagement in crypto communities.

informative_value.justification: Opinion-based statement without supporting data or context.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Moderately positive toward Solana through implied endorsement.

duration_of_impact.justification: Platform comparisons remain relevant for typical market cycle durations.

virality_potential.justification: Combination of US politics and major cryptocurrencies creates high share potential across multiple communities.

informative_value.justification: Links to political engagement with crypto but lacks specific details about responses.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral reporting of political engagement without stated opinion.

duration_of_impact.justification: Political crypto discourse will remain relevant through election cycles.

virality_potential.justification: NFT utility announcement could spread within Japanese crypto communities.

informative_value.justification: Details specific NFT marketplace features and partnerships.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral service announcement with practical information.

duration_of_impact.justification: Marketplace functionality could maintain relevance for weeks among NFT users.

virality_potential.justification: Provocative inflation/deflation comparison with price prediction encourages sharing.

informative_value.justification: Contains specific, verifiable blockchain metrics with time frame.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Very positive sentiment toward Ethereum with rocket emoji and price target.

duration_of_impact.justification: Economic metrics remain relevant for multiple market cycles.

virality_potential.justification: Shock humor about crypto exit strategies could spread as controversial meme.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Very negative portrayal of crypto investment practices.

duration_of_impact.justification: Shock humor typically has short viral lifespan.

virality_potential.justification: Regulatory criticism from verified account could spread in crypto circles.

informative_value.justification: Highlights regulatory uncertainty but lacks primary source links.

duration_of_impact.justification: Regulatory clarity discussions remain relevant for months.

virality_potential.justification: Single-word tweet with image lacks inherent shareability drivers.

informative_value.justification: No substantive content beyond the word 'Ethereum'.

virality_potential.justification: Giveaway incentive structure drives high engagement and sharing.

informative_value.justification: Primarily promotional content about company restructuring.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Very positive tone with celebration emoji and giveaway excitement.

duration_of_impact.justification: Giveaway relevance expires after winner announcement.
